author: Kenny Trychon
comment: Love it that  my Notepad is  easy  settle. All can  save  memes won't  lost list.  seem  be  worth  it  for  me.  note,  menu, easy  notice list. Most  ever  seen  that most  of  amazing Notepad! Works with my Samsung Galaxy S7 and Asus Zenpad S 8.0 Z580CA too. I want to put  full star! This  a lot FREE!

This app does exactly as advertised... simple to use ... no frills...uses the kiss method (keep it simple stupid) no adverts...if  it were to come down to a fee to keep it this way...would certainly be worth it. Great job.!!! If it isn't broke don't fix it. Finally found the best note pad. Regards...Keith...in Canada

author: Basil Nestor
comment: Wow! Very simple, uncomplicated, and exactly what I need. It's easy to write a note and autosave the note when you hit the back key. Notes are saved in a list. Easy to save/convert to txt. This app is LESS complicated than Keep or Evernote. It's PERFECT! Well, okay, it would be nice to have a character count for each note. But really, it's great as it is. And it works beautifully with Android 7 Nougat!
बेहतरीन, बहुत अच्छा

author: Manoranjan Das
comment: Good App..

author: Edna Mae Sunvison
comment: Thank you!  Been looking for an app similar to an old one I have that is no longer available.  This one is great.  The only addition that would be nice is if you had the option to make a todo check list, also.  This is what my old app has, and I love the versatility.  I can use it for everything.  Love, love, love the "No Ads" and the option to print as well!!!  Not to many note apps have either!  Thanks again.

Simply loved this app. I jott down important things immediately and access the notes later for reference. Tried at least 20 other apps but none to my satisfaction as this one. Simple an precise. Excellent work by the developer. Please don't change anything now. It's superb as is.

author: Vlad Jennings
comment: Thank you for a true notepad. Simple and easy. Nice there is a darkened theme 👍 My phone kept telling me can't access this file as it's being scanned. Went looking for a quick, easy notepad. This imported the file I was trying to open and it opened. Much better than the onboard quick memo from LG. Easily best 5 star rating ever given.

author: Elsie Anne Owings
comment: Did a beautiful job of importing my notes, and no ads! The only thing I don't like is that every time I tap to edit,  it jumps to the bottom of the page,  which is a nuisance when working with a shopping list.

author: Scott Davis
comment: I switched to Android from Blackberry a few weeks ago and I have been looking for a no frills note taking app since. Have looked at hundreds but this one is what I've been looking for - simple, no ads, ability to export notes, clean, no nonsense. Perfect for me. Thanks dev.

author: Chris Davis
comment: this note app is just what I wanted. record simple notes, save or import text files. no ads, no extra baggage...

author: Profiledek
comment: No annoying extras, very simple, notes without titles - finally, perfection! Big respect for creating such simple apps

author: Ali Vaziri
comment: A simple, minimalistic and to some degree customizable (through a couple of themes) that does what it should and more. I used it for simple text editing and managing multiple entries for clipboard, but after finding that it can support markup/html, it became one of the most used apps on my phone for anything text related from notes, memos and drafts to code snippets!

author: Cool Ideas Channel
comment: This apps does not backup to a single database file for export. Instead, each Note has to be saved individually as a text file in a directory folder you choose. Just click the Save icon, which appears only when you enter to read that particular note. As at Oct 2017, it is not possible to save numerous texts in one go by highlighting.... After the texts are saved, you can share the entire directory to cloud/card for safekeeping. However importing is easier, you dont need to handle the Notes filed one by one. The settings button has an Import function, you can highlight several text files at one go to import. Although quite troublesome, the advantages of this app is the clean interface, the ability to choose font size and hence line spacing, and an option to auto edit directly. And no annoying ads, no need to pay. I dumped 20 other notepad apps to keep this one, and could accept the primitive backup system.

author: Tad Lewis
comment: Would love to see the ability to change font size and maybe change to a mono spaced font. Don't care which one and don't care about actual point size, just plus up or down. Very much appreciate the ability to print however!

author: furiaczeka
comment: Simple and easy to use, with a few options and backup(only one at a time?)/restore(multiple files at once) with .txt extension.

author: Alex Flockhart
comment: Nice interface, but can't seem to copy or paste, which is a huge necessity

author: Systerm Root
comment: No search and cant't edit .txt file directly from the phone memory!!

author: Linda Hare
comment: It's just a simple notepad, no bells and whistles. I finally found one I can understand and how to use.

author: Roger Parker
comment: No ability to instruct where notes are stored - garbage app.

author: CANNIBAL ಠ_ಠ
comment: Can't lock private notes.
i don't know what'd how'd doesn't actually  there are no mega packs but it will have to do! sorry with with those words

author: Shameed Karim
comment: Plain and simole. No ads and does everything I want in a notepad. Imports, saves, selects multiple, has a dark theme and easy to use. Best on the app store.

author: N Roman
comment: Looove this app!!! BEST notepad there is, I have tried many & liked a few quite well, this one can't be beat!!! Just wish I could give it 10  stars! :) Rock on!

author: Venu Gopalannair
comment: Unable to sort , that is why I am uninstalling.
I did not find the place where it stores its notes, and did not find the place wher the exported files are written

author: MAZHAITHULIGAL MURALI
comment: Simple & cute. But no options to store at desired location. Thanks for Ad free

author: Shah A
comment: Love the simplicity and without any excessive dodgy permissions.
I love this Notepad App, it's the Best App i ever had.
Good note pad, does not have any annoying ads.

author: James B Dick
comment: Needed this.  Good for .txt.  File handling could be a bit more intuitive.  Where does it store files which are not exported?
Simple, easy to use, no permissions needed, not too big an APK, exactly what I wanted!

author: Sergey Davydov
comment: I've been finding an easy and useful notepad so long

author: NetAdmiN
comment: I like it for now

author: Lee Callan
comment: A no frills notepad that just works! Perfect!

author: Buen Ragos
comment: very good & nice very easy too use..simple is good

author: Sher Khan
comment: Not bad but no storage location

author: Windows Guy
comment: Works on my motog5 perfect
title: Fantastic

author: Varit Chalao
comment: Best app in the world.  Thank you.

author: Serghei Jomiru
